attributes.title: TRASH!! Waist of storage
attributes.review: It took forever to download, and whenever I try to get in it lags out and kicks me out of the app. Disappointed how long it took to download just for it to lag out.

attributes.title: Very hard to use app
attributes.review: This app is possibly the worst thing i've downloaded. It's hard to function and I feel as if it will give my phone a virus.

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️✨ Just No ✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: The gigantic cheeto strikes again, the fat lard that is our President created one of the worst apps known to man. This is awful, racist, homophobic and just downright nasty. Take the app off of our appstore so I don’t have to see it again.

attributes.title: This is not OK
attributes.review: Ok, I opened up this app for any political news and and vote trump 2020, then it showed all these stupid pop ups and I saw trump in his underwear taking a shower, I WAS WITH MY KIDS, they are scared to life because of this behavior, I will not except this. He is disgusting.

attributes.title: Horrible don’t get it🙈💘💞
attributes.review: I am a very loyal trump supporter but the app had a lot of glitches (just like your president) am still waiting for the Simpsons prediction to come true😌trump 2020 on a gravestone tho luv<3 i love my daddy my sugar daddy also free Barron he didn’t do none😤VOTE FOR AOC AND BERNIE😡THE ONLY KING BERNIE AND QUEEN AOC🕺🏽

attributes.title: Don’t recommend this app
attributes.review: It was really hard to use didn’t get much from it and too many notifications all day long -1/10

attributes.title: Booooo!
attributes.review: I got the app to see if it is worth voting for Trump. It’s not. First of all the app took like a week to download no joke. Secondly, it spammed me constantly. And lastly I saw an oversized Cheeto and was almost scared to death. The great trumpkin isn’t getting my vote in the 2020 election.

attributes.title: stupid app.
attributes.review: I hate trump but made me hat him more. this app got hacked and all I could see was trumps face 🍊🍊🍊. Help. SOS. Then anonymous came on the screen and told me about Barron trump. so sorry man. Trump I hope you see this and I hope you loose the election.

attributes.title: Ohhh no not again
attributes.review: I went to download the app then my phone started getting hot and I just bought my phone. So I had to delete it so no one can go through what I did

attributes.title: Bad app🤮
attributes.review: I wanted to get the app to see what trumps plans were for 2020 but after a while I started to realized he was a terrible person and doesn’t deserve an app nor the place as our president 🤮
